title: enna seivAyO kaNNA
sahitya:
enna seivAyO kaNNA ennai engE uippAyO ellAm un sheyalE


anupallavi

  tannam taniyAga vandEn sharaN pughundEn unnaiyallAl enakk-uyirillai ulagillai


caraNam    tEnukkuL inimai pOl tInkani rasattaip-pOl vAnukkuL vaLaiyaip-pOl mazhaiyilE minnal pOl
UnukkuL uyiraip-pOl uyirkkuL uNarvu nI oruvA en iraivA unparam un sheyal
